verses.roman:
ei prema sadā jāge yāhāra antare
paṇḍiteha tāra ceṣṭā bujhite nā pāre

synonyms: ei—this; prema—love of Godhead; sadā—always; jāge—awakens; yāhāra—of whom; antare—within the heart; paṇḍiteha—even a learned scholar; tāra—his; ceṣṭā—activities; bujhite—to understand; nā pāre—cannot.
translation: When transcendental love of Kṛṣṇa awakens in one's heart, even a learned scholar cannot comprehend one's activities.
